name: Lucha Amigos
description:
Forget Ninja Turtles, and meet Wrestlers Turtles! Crazier, Spicier and…Bouncier!

Sling carapaces of 7 Luchadores to knock all your enemies out!

Team up with this friendly bunch of heroic turtles and use their unique skills to clear 100 stages and save the world from a gang of Evil Cacti. Discover a creative, easy to learn, yet challenging game, ideal for short play sessions.

Key Features:
• Well-known slingshot gameplay refined with fresh and spicy ideas!
• 7 Bouncy Heroes with unique abilities to trigger
• 100 levels and challenging situations that will make you think
• Comical plot and characters that will make you laugh
• Top-quality music and graphics inspired by Mexican folklore

With lots of content, short challenges and a top-notch presentation, Lucha Amigos suits all kinds of players and all play sessions, whether you’re chilling, commuting or dumping yesterday's tacos.
